UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Differential activity of lytic alpha-helical peptides on lactobacilli and lactobacilli-derived liposomes.
Literature.Author: Szymanowski F, Balatti GE, Ambroggio E, Hugo AA, Martini MF, Fidelio GD, Gómez-Zavaglia A, Pickholz M, Pérez PF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. lactis CIDCA 133(MIC=50µM),Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus CIDCA 331(MIC=25µM)
